page.title: 09Trades
page.content: One of the trades in our area is St.John's Bakery. I am the daughter of Mr.St.John who owns the bakery. We own four shops. One in Warsash,Stubbington,Woolworths in Fareham and Titchfield where the bakery is.We have over 12 people working in the bakery and over 15 working in the four shops. Downstairs in the bakery there are 2 ovens which are fixed onto the wall,4 mixers,10 large tables,1 cutter,2 machines which roll the pastry into balls. Downstairs they make the bread,rolls,saviouries and cook some cakes. Upstairs they make the cake filling in the cakes. My dad makes the birthday cakes and wedding cakes,he also works a lot making bread. My dad gets up at 4.00 am each day and works to 12.00. Then he goes to bed for most of the day.
